name: Penguin Synchron
text: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 banished "Penguin" monster, but its effects are negated. If this card is in your GY: You can return 1 card from your hand to the top of your Deck; Special Summon this card but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Penguin Synchron" once per turn.
